title: florin
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150104012111/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Characters](http://web.archive.org/web/20150104012111/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Characters) : Florin**

A now-defunct currency symbol, which shares a [Unicode](http://web.archive.org/web/20150104012111/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Unicode) codepoint with the hooked f used in African languages.

**Discussion:**  
 [Florin](http://web.archive.org/web/20150104012111/http:/typophile.com/node/9913)  
 [Who Has Examples of the 'Florin' in Use?](http://web.archive.org/web/20150104012111/http:/typophile.com/node/13226)  
 [U+0192](http://web.archive.org/web/20150104012111/http:/typophile.com/node/35138)
author: paul d hunt
